k10 11 pm cont to knit to marker that denotes the beginning of your round you should now have 4 evenly spaced markers throughout your round 4 corners knit every round increasing kfb every other row before and after each stitch marker as you come to them complete the increase row every other row 10 11 times 2 agag ybab back split for side vents at beg of round knit to next marker remove turn work purl past beg of round marker to the next marker remove turn work you are now knitting stockinette stitch flat on the back of the capelet cont in stockinette for 1 5 inches ending on a ws row rs k2 p2 for 2 inches bind off front rs join yarn k across front of capelet in stockinette for 1 inch ending on a ws front panel is slightly shorter that back panel k2 p2 for 1 5 inches bind off weave in ends block if necessary add fun detail to left front if desired i used a hand dyed hannah silk ribbon tied in a bow and then added a clip-on rhinestone earring in the middle of the bow put on cute baby pinch cheeks *****why do i design baby sweaters knit out of non-acrylic yarn because acrylic when held to a flame melts whereas wool/ cotton/natural fibers immediately extinguish causing less harm to
